mapper.select: SELECT `ID`, `UID`, `EVENT_ID`, `KEEP_TIME`, `BOOK_ID`, `MONEY`, `TYPE_ID`, `OUT_IN`, `REMARK`, `CREATE_TIME`, `UPDATE_TIME` FROM CBS_T_BOOK_KEEP ORDER BY ID DESC
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM CBS_T_BOOK_KEEP WHERE ID IN
#{id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select T1.DTE, IFNULL(T2.UID, #{uid}) AS UID, IFNULL(T2.MONEY, 0) AS MONEY, IFNULL(T2.OUT_IN, #{outIn}) AS OUT_IN from ( select * from (select adddate('1970-01-01',t4.i*10000 + t3.i*1000 + t2.i*100 + t1.i*10 + t0.i) DTE from (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t0, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t1, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t2, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t3, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t4) v where DTE between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ) T1 left join ( select date_format(keep_time, '%Y-%m-%d') DTE, UID, SUM(MONEY) AS MONEY, OUT_IN from CBS_T_BOOK_KEEP where UID = #{uid} and date_format(keep_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and OUT_IN = #{outIn} group by DTE ) T2 ON T1.DTE = T2.DTE ) T order by DTE

select T1.MONEY, T2.ID, IFNULL(T2.TYPE_NAME, '其他') AS TYPE_NAME, IFNULL(T2.TYPE_ICON,'') AS TYPE_ICON FROM ( SELECT TYPE_ID, SUM(MONEY) AS MONEY FROM CBS_T_BOOK_KEEP WHERE UID = #{uid} AND DATE_FORMAT(keep_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} and OUT_IN = #{outIn} GROUP BY TYPE_ID ) T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CBS_T_KEEP_TYPE WHERE UID = #{uid} ) T2 ON T1.TYPE_ID = T2.ID
SELECT SUM(MONEY) AS MONEY FROM CBS_T_BOOK_KEEP WHERE UID = #{uid} AND DATE_FORMAT(keep_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} and OUT_IN = #{outIn}
